welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Weilmunster, a charming city known for its picturesque landscapes and rich history. We are excited to have you here and invite you to discover all the wonders this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Main terminal for domestic and international flights

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Air Base Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Air Base Airport, mainly used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and oldest terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, serving mainly Lufthansa and its Star Alliance partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newer terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, serving mainly non-Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Under construction and expected to open in 2023, Terminal 3 will increase the airport's capacity to 90 million passengers per year.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with the option to upgrade to a faster connection for a fee.
